I NEED TO EAT (Tip jar)
A tip jar for people that wanna give me a lil help for my work. I really love to draw, but it doesn't always pay well. At least this little help will motivate me to continue with my artistic projects! I APPRECIATE SO MUCH YOUR SUPPORT! (੭*ˊᵕˋ)੭
